titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a full deduction for meals and lodging in connection with medical care.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a full deduction for meals and lodging in connection with medical care.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code concerning the medical care tax deduction to: (1) include meals away from home within the deduction; and (2) eliminate the $50 per individual per night ceiling for medically-related meals and lodging.
